controls.title: Entitlement
controls.description: Establish formal identity and access management policies for ACM certificate lifecycle management with proper entitlement controls

implementation.description: Implement IAM policies through CloudFormation/Terraform templates defining least-privilege access to ACM operations including certificate request, validation, renewal, and deletion with proper entitlement controls

controls.title: Secure Disposal
controls.description: Ensure proper secure disposal and destruction of certificate private keys and sensitive certificate data when no longer needed

implementation.description: ACM automatically manages secure disposal of private keys using FIPS 140-2 Level 3 compliant HSMs with cryptographic erasure when certificates are deleted

controls.title: Entitlement
controls.description: Implement proper entitlement controls for encryption key management and access to certificate private keys

implementation.description: ACM uses AWS managed HSMs and KMS for private key generation, storage, and protection with FIPS 140-2 Level 3 compliance and strict access controls preventing user access to private keys

controls.title: Audit Logging / Audit Trails
controls.description: Enable comprehensive logging of certificate management activities

implementation.description: Configure CloudTrail to log all ACM API calls and integrate with CloudWatch for monitoring certificate operations and lifecycle events

controls.title: Baseline Requirements
controls.description: Establish baseline security requirements and monitor for certificate vulnerabilities, ensuring timely renewal and compliance

implementation.description: Set up CloudWatch alarms for certificate expiration, implement automated renewal processes where possible, and maintain security baselines for certificate management

controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: Manage accounts with access to certificate management functions

implementation.description: Implement IAM roles and policies with time-bound access and regular access reviews for ACM administrative functions

controls.title: Least Privilege
controls.description: Enforce least privilege access to ACM certificate operations

implementation.description: Create granular IAM policies limiting ACM permissions to specific actions and resources based on job functions

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect certificate data during transmission

implementation.description: ACM API calls are encrypted in transit using TLS 1.2+ and certificate deployment to AWS services maintains encryption

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Log certificate management events for security monitoring

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for ACM events and configure log retention policies in CloudWatch Logs

controls.title: Alternate Processing Site
controls.description: Ensure certificate availability across multiple regions for business continuity

implementation.description: Deploy certificates in multiple AWS regions and maintain certificate availability for alternate processing sites

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor certificate usage and health

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch metrics and alarms for certificate status monitoring and expiration notifications

controls.title: Imported and ACM-issued certificates should be renewed after a specified time period
controls.description: Ensure certificates are renewed before expiration to maintain service availability

implementation.description: Set up automated renewal for ACM-managed certificates and establish renewal procedures for imported certificates with CloudWatch alarms

controls.title: Certificate Validation Method Security
controls.description: Use secure validation methods for certificate domain validation

implementation.description: Prefer DNS validation over email validation for domain ownership verification and ensure DNS records are properly secured

controls.title: Cross-Region Certificate Management
controls.description: Implement consistent certificate management across regions

implementation.description: Deploy certificates in multiple regions as needed and maintain consistent naming and tagging strategies across regions

controls.title: Certificate Transparency Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor Certificate Transparency logs for unauthorized certificates

implementation.description: Implement monitoring tools to track certificate issuance in Certificate Transparency logs for your domains

cost.name: AWS ACM Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Use ACM Public Certificates Instead of Third-Party
controls.description: Utilize free ACM public certificates instead of purchasing third-party certificates

implementation.description: Replace third-party SSL certificates with free ACM public certificates for AWS-integrated services to eliminate certificate purchase costs

controls.title: Optimize Multi-Domain Certificates
controls.description: Use Subject Alternative Names (SAN) to consolidate multiple domains under single certificates

implementation.description: Request certificates with multiple domain names in SAN field instead of individual certificates to reduce management overhead

controls.title: Eliminate Unused Certificates
controls.description: Regular cleanup of unused or expired imported certificates

implementation.description: Implement automated processes to identify and remove unused imported certificates to avoid unnecessary storage costs

controls.title: Leverage Wildcard Certificates
controls.description: Use wildcard certificates for multiple subdomains of the same domain

implementation.description: Request wildcard certificates (*.example.com) for applications with multiple subdomains to reduce certificate management complexity

controls.title: Optimize Regional Certificate Placement
controls.description: Deploy certificates only in required regions to minimize cross-region data transfer costs

implementation.description: Provision ACM certificates only in regions where they are actively used by services to optimize network costs

controls.title: Automate Certificate Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Implement automation to reduce operational overhead and manual certificate management costs

implementation.description: Use Infrastructure as Code and AWS Lambda functions to automate certificate provisioning, renewal notifications, and lifecycle management
